languages.text: {n}В дрожащих, едва гнущихся руках возникает тонкое лезвие, спустя миг на лбу старца кровоточит символ династии. Коротким движением культист смахивает кровь с клинка, и несколько капель попадают на ваше лицо.{/n} "Кровавая паутина приветствует госпо{mf|дина|жу} ново{mf|го|ю}. Я Висирь ее. Множество лет ждали мы — и вот ты приш{mf|ел|ла}". {n}"Мы ждали", — доносятся шепоты из теней.{/n}

{n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В дрожащих, едва гнущихся руках возникает тонкое лезвие, спустя миг на лбу старца кровоточит символ династии. Коротким движением культист смахивает кровь с клинка, и несколько капель попадают на ваше лицо.{/n} "Кровавая паутина приветствует госпо{mf|дина|жу} ново{mf|го|ю}. Я Висирь ее. Множество лет ждали мы — и вот ты приш{mf|ел|ла}". {n}"Мы ждали", — доносятся шепоты из теней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Despite the old man barely being able to bend his arms, only a moment later the dynasty's symbol is bleeding on his forehead. With a brief movement, the cultist flicks blood away from his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am its Vizsier. We have waited for many years, and now you are here." "We have waited," {n}say whispers from the shadows.{/n}

With a brief movement, the cultist flicks blood away from his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am its Vizsier. We have waited for many years, and now you are here." "We have waited," {n}say whispers from the shadows.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine dünne Klinge erscheint in den zitternden Händen des alten Mannes. Seine Arme sind zwar steif und wirken, als könnte er sie kaum noch beugen, doch im nächsten Augenblick ist schon das Symbol der Dynastie in seine Stirn geritzt. Blut tropft herab. Mit einer kurzen Bewegung lässt er das Blut von seiner Klinge spritzen. Mehrere Tropfen landen in deinem Gesicht.{/n} "Das Blutgesponnene Netz heißt {mf|seinen neuen Lord|seine neue Lady} willkommen. Ich bin der Wesir. Viele Jahre haben wir gewartet, und nun seid Ihr hier." {n}"Wir haben gewartet", wiederholen flüsternde Stimmen aus den Schatten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine dünne Klinge erscheint in den zitternden Händen des alten Mannes. Seine Arme sind zwar steif und wirken, als könnte er sie kaum noch beugen, doch im nächsten Augenblick ist schon das Symbol der Dynastie in seine Stirn geritzt. Blut tropft herab. Mit einer kurzen Bewegung lässt er das Blut von seiner Klinge spritzen. Mehrere Tropfen landen in deinem Gesicht.{/n} "Das Blutgesponnene Netz heißt {mf|seinen neuen Lord|seine neue Lady} willkommen. Ich bin der Wesir. Viele Jahre haben wir gewartet, und nun seid Ihr hier." {n}"Wir haben gewartet", wiederholen flüsternde Stimmen aus den Schatten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una daga delgada aparece en las manos temblorosas del anciano. Aunque sus brazos están tan rígidos que apenas parece que pueda doblarlos, el símbolo de la dinastía aparece en su frente en un instante, goteando sangre. Con un movimiento veloz, sacude la sangre de su hoja y algunas gotas salpican tu rostro.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta da la bienvenida a su nuev{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}. Soy el Visir. Hemos esperado durante muchos años, y por fin está aquí». {n}Unos susurros repiten sus palabras desde las sombras: «Hemos esperado».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una daga delgada aparece en las manos temblorosas del anciano. Aunque sus brazos están tan rígidos que apenas parece que pueda doblarlos, el símbolo de la dinastía aparece en su frente en un instante, goteando sangre. Con un movimiento veloz, sacude la sangre de su hoja y algunas gotas salpican tu rostro.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta da la bienvenida a su nuev{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}. Soy el Visir. Hemos esperado durante muchos años, y por fin está aquí». {n}Unos susurros repiten sus palabras desde las sombras: «Hemos esperado».{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人の震える手の中に薄い刃が現れる。彼の腕は固く、曲げるのがやっとのように見えたものの、次の瞬間、彼の額に王朝のシンボルが刻まれ、血がしたたり落ちた。一瞬の動きで彼が刃に着いた血を弾くと、あなたの顔に数滴が飛び散る。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは新たな主人をお迎えする。私はヴィジール。何年もの間お待ちしており、あなたはついにここにやってきた。」{n}「我らは待っていた」影から彼の言葉が囁くように反響する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人の震える手の中に薄い刃が現れる。彼の腕は固く、曲げるのがやっとのように見えたものの、次の瞬間、彼の額に王朝のシンボルが刻まれ、血がしたたり落ちた。一瞬の動きで彼が刃に着いた血を弾くと、あなたの顔に数滴が飛び散る。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは新たな主人をお迎えする。私はヴィジール。何年もの間お待ちしており、あなたはついにここにやってきた。」{n}「我らは待っていた」影から彼の言葉が囁くように反響する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一把薄薄的利刃出现在老人颤抖的手中。尽管他的胳膊看起来非常僵硬，似乎根本无法弯曲一样，但在接下来的一瞬间，他就在自己的额头上刻下了王朝的印迹，鲜血淋漓。他轻轻挥手，将刀刃上的血迹抖落，几滴血落在了你的脸上。{/n}“织血罗网欢迎新的主人。我是宿老，我们等待了这么多年，如今您终于来了。”{n}“我们一直在等待。”阴影中的众多声音重复着他的低语。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一把薄薄的利刃出现在老人颤抖的手中。尽管他的胳膊看起来非常僵硬，似乎根本无法弯曲一样，但在接下来的一瞬间，他就在自己的额头上刻下了王朝的印迹，鲜血淋漓。他轻轻挥手，将刀刃上的血迹抖落，几滴血落在了你的脸上。{/n}“织血罗网欢迎新的主人。我是宿老，我们等待了这么多年，如今您终于来了。”{n}“我们一直在等待。”阴影中的众多声音重复着他的低语。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une fine lame apparaît entre les mains tremblantes du vieillard. Si ses bras raidis par l'âge ne se courbent qu'à grand-peine, l'instant d'après, le symbole de la dynastie est gravé sur son front ensanglanté. D'un geste sec, il secoue sa lame pour en ôter le sang, et plusieurs gouttes atterrissent sur votre visage.{/n} « La Toile de Sang salue {mf|son nouveau maître|sa nouvelle maîtresse}. Je suis le vizir. Nous vous attendions depuis de longues années, et à présent, vous voilà parmi nous. » {n}« Nous vous attendions, » reprennent en écho les murmures venus des ombres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une fine lame apparaît entre les mains tremblantes du vieillard. Si ses bras raidis par l'âge ne se courbent qu'à grand-peine, l'instant d'après, le symbole de la dynastie est gravé sur son front ensanglanté. D'un geste sec, il secoue sa lame pour en ôter le sang, et plusieurs gouttes atterrissent sur votre visage.{/n} « La Toile de Sang salue {mf|son nouveau maître|sa nouvelle maîtresse}. Je suis le vizir. Nous vous attendions depuis de longues années, et à présent, vous voilà parmi nous. » {n}« Nous vous attendions, » reprennent en écho les murmures venus des ombres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adamın ellerinde incecik bir bıçak beliriyor. Kolları kaskatı kesilmiş ve güç bela kıvrılıyormuş gibi görünse de göz açıp kapayana kadar alnına hanedanlık sembolünü kazıyor. Sembolden kan damlıyor. Seri bir hareketle bıçağın üzerindeki kanı silkeliyor. Kanın birkaç damlası yüzüne sıçrıyor.{/n} "Kanipi Ağı, yeni {mf|lordunu|leydisini} memnuniyetle karşılıyor. Ben Vezirim. Uzun yıllar boyunca bekledik, en nihayetinde geldiniz." {n}Gölgelerden yükselen fısıltılarda "Bekledik" sözleri yankılanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A thin blade appears in the old man's trembling hands. Although his arms are stiff and look like they can barely bend, in the next instant the dynasty's symbol is etched on his forehead, dripping blood. With a brief motion, he flicks the blood off his blade, and several drops land on your face.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web welcomes its new {mf|lord|lady}. I am the Vizsier. For many years we have waited, and now you are here." {n}"We have waited," whispers echo his words from the shadows.{/n}
